tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE photos (
    photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    photo_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_id INT,
    photographer_name VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Photos (
  photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  photo_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  landscape_id INT,
  cityscape_id INT,
  studio_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Photos (
  photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  photo_name VARCHAR(255),
  photo_description TEXT,
  photographer_id INT,
  location_id INT
);
